description: Assists the user in choosing their desired travel destination by prompting for input and offering suggestions if needed.
body: Welcome to Easy Flights! The place to find the cheapest one-way flights! First, start off by inputting which airport you are departing from! This should be a three letter airport code.

description: Assists the user in organizing flight results by various criteria such as price, departure time, or arrival time.
body: Welcome to the flights result page! On the left you can sort the flight options by Price, Departure Time, or Arrival Time.

description: Assists the user in securely providing their credit card details for payment processing.
body: Now, please enter your credit card information, including card number, expiry date, and CVV.

description: Assists the user in setting their budget by allowing them to specify minimum and maximum price ranges for flights.
body: Then, you can set a budget for your flight using a minimum and maximum amount.

description: Enables the user to clear all applied filters and return to the original list of available flights.
body: If you wish to clear all filters and view all available flights, click the "Reset Filters" button.

description: Encourages the user to initiate the flight search based on the entered criteria.
body: Ready to find the best flights for your trip? Click the "Search Flights" button to begin.

description: Guides the user in filtering flights based on preferred departure times, categorizing them into Morning, Afternoon, or Evening.
body: Let's refine your search by departure time. Do you prefer Morning, Afternoon, or Evening flights?

description: Guides the user through entering necessary personal details required for the booking.
body: Here is your planned itinerary. Take a moment to double check the information at the top, then please enter your personal information, including your full name and email address.

description: Guides the user to view more details about a specific flight by selecting it from the search results.
body: Found a flight that suits your needs? Click the "Select" button to view more details about this flight.

description: Helps the user choose a departure date.
body: When will you be departing? Please use the calendar to select your date.

description: Helps the user filter flights based on desired arrival times, offering options like Morning, Afternoon, or Evening.
body: Would you like to filter flights by arrival time? Please select your preferred arrival window: Morning, Afternoon, or Evening.

description: Helps the user finalize their booking by confirming the purchase after entering all necessary information.
body: Finally, click the purchase button to purchase your ticket. Have a wonderful and safe journey!

description: Now, enter your arrival airport using the 3-letter IATA code (e.g., JFK).
